Template used: "Pre-order shipping, when will my pre-order arrive?"; last updated: 2025-05-07 18:45:20.495

Comfrt: Hi, thanks for reaching out. I completely understand how important it is to receive your order. You'll get a tracking email as soon as your order ships. If you don't see it in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders, sometimes our emails end up there as well. In the meantime, details on your pre-order should be in the order confirmation email sent to you. Please note that this date is an estimate and is not a guaranteed date of delivery or receipt. The estimated delivery date that you receive in your confirmation email is subject to change based on production, supplier availability, or other unforeseen circumstances. Hope this helps.
